½ cup unsalted butter,1 ½ cups thinly sliced yellow onion,1 cup thinly sliced fennel,1 cup thinly sliced celery,1 cup thinly sliced carrots,½ cup all-purpose flour,½ cup dry white wine,3 cups fish stock,¼ cup heavy cream, divided,1 tablespoon kosher salt,½ teaspoon ground black pepper,1 (8 ounce) fillet halibut, skin removed, cut into 1-inch pieces,½ pound sea scallops, halved horizontally,½ pound peeled and deveined medium shrimp,1 pound jumbo lump crabmeat, picked over,1 cup frozen green peas,2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, plus more for garnish,1 large egg, lightly beaten,1 (17.3 ounce) package frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed,,
